price: زموږ وينا خو چې كله د يو شي اراده وكړو، بس چې ورته وايو: شه نو هغه كيږي.
arabic: إِنَّمَا قَوۡلُنَا لِشَيۡءٍ إِذَآ أَرَدۡنَٰهُ أَن نَّقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: innamā qawlunā lishayin idhā aradnāhu an naqūla lahu kun fayakūnu
